subject: [OT] Please uns*bscribe giftadmin@objectorb.com
body:
Please uns*bscribe giftadmin@objectorb.com 
to free us from their silly bounces. 

(I sent this to beginners-owner@perl.org before, 
but got no reaction.)

-- 
Affijn, Ruud

"Gewoon is een tijger."


-- 
To unsubscribe, e-mail: beginners-unsubscribe@perl.org
For additional commands, e-mail: beginners-help@perl.org
http://learn.perl.org/
